name: Element.clientLeft
description: The width of the left border of an element in pixels. It includes the width of the vertical scrollbar if the text direction of the element is right–to–left and if there is an overflow causing a left vertical scrollbar to be rendered. clientLeft does not include the left margin or the left padding. clientLeft is read-only.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module
refs.description: The definition of 'clientLeft' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module.
